NEXT Committee Team Alignment


We had the privilege of joining the NEXT committee in Bahrain for an unforgettable journey, where they explored the country’s rich history, dynamic culture, and innovation-driven future.
To conclude this immersive experience, the committee participated in an engaging activity at Marassi Galleria, tackling 5 challenges focused on retail trends and the customer journey in Bahrain. Their insights will play a key role in enhancing the overall customer experience.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/29572ed1-5216-abcb-756e-a0d1b35426a8.jpg> 	
	

Skincare Squad Final Project

We had the privilege of joining the NEXT committee in Bahrain for an unforgettable journey, where they explored the country’s rich history, dynamic culture, and innovation-driven future.
To conclude this immersive experience, the committee participated in an engaging activity at Marassi Galleria, tackling 5 challenges focused on retail trends and the customer journey in Bahrain. Their insights will play a key role in enhancing the overall customer experience.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/29572ed1-5216-abcb-756e-a0d1b35426a8.jpg> 	
	

Skincare Squad Final Project


Batch 2 of the Skincare Squad has successfully completed their training programme, marking an incredible journey with an engaging Final Project. 11 experts offered facials, personalised consultations, and massages. The event also featured an exciting "Spin the Wheel" activity, where over 100 goody bags from our beloved skincare brands were gifted to delighted winners.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/c31af519-1923-8ea0-8623-dbedc9eab20d.jpg> 	
	

Tech Away Day


The Tech and Data team alignment was a day filled with energy, creativity, and inspiring collaboration. From building and flying kites to exploring the limitless potential of AI, the team engaged in activities that sparked innovation and strengthened connections.

The Tech and Data team alignment was a day filled with energy, creativity, and inspiring collaboration. From building and flying kites to exploring the limitless potential of AI, the team engaged in activities that sparked innovation and strengthened connections.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/312d8871-13cf-d542-8d71-993aff7c4dfa.jpg> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/08ee498b-57ec-53e6-e2d3-a8bc51692371.jpg> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/8ea49d04-39dc-b5d9-0938-33ef4d9bd003.jpg> 	
	

Leading Leaders - Module 3


We have successfully completed the Leading Leaders Programme with the Leading Organisation module. This programme empowers servant leaders with key organisational leadership skills. The module included a dynamic improv acting session by guest faculty Lea Maalouf, enhancing the leaders’ presence, influence, and agility.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/5018de7e-8cf8-823d-6e37-d6f5a563b7b0.jpg> 	
	

Leadership Academy Roadshow


The Leadership Academy Roadshow took place on January 30th! The virtual session introduced the comprehensive changes and additions to our leadership programmes, designed to empower Leaders in the Group.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/23f73439-244f-c090-93a5-3f23be7ef1c9.png> 	
	

Lacoste Shift Final Project

The Leadership Academy Roadshow took place on January 30th! The virtual session introduced the comprehensive changes and additions to our leadership programmes, designed to empower Leaders in the Group.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/23f73439-244f-c090-93a5-3f23be7ef1c9.png> 	
	

Lacoste Shift Final Project


The Lacoste Shift Final Project is developing transformational leaders who inspire and empower their teams through visionary thinking, problem-solving, and bold decision-making. 4 participants successfully completed the final phase, marking a significant milestone for the Lacoste team in their leadership journey.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/8ed15893-a0e3-ff89-c3aa-5800118120a1.jpg> 	
	

Learning Pathways | Top Learners Q4 2024


A huge Congratulations to our top learners for Quater! Your commitment to continuous learning and development has been outstanding, leveraging the value of the Learning Pathways and setting a benchmark for growth. 

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/702574ed-86b7-37a0-afc1-d64d30cff8a2.png>

Own your development with Udemy


Meet Raed Hamed who is the Udemy star of this month, having completed over 24 hours of learning on Udemy in January 2025. Join Raed and others and start learning today. Discover more by clicking the link.
